display.title: Crafting Spell Tomes - Overview
display.description: In order to craft a Spell Tome you must drop an Enchanted Book, Infused Paper, Allay/Vex Membrane or Ancient Eye & a Heart of Affinity onto a Spell Altar. Each combination will result in a different Spell Tome [Required: 1x Specified Enchanted Book 1x Infused Paper 1x Unique Item 1x Heart of Affinity | Drop Craft With: Spell Altar]
